Package model

Class CloverVilleModelManager

java.lang.Object
model.CloverVilleModelManager
public class CloverVilleModelManager extends Object
A model manager providing a single access point to the model
Author:
Christina Jacob, Sandu Tricolici, Yuliia Iliienko

  • Constructor Details

    • CloverVilleModelManager

      public CloverVilleModelManager(String greenActionsFile, String tradeOffersFile, String residentsFile, String communityPoolFile, String thresholdsFile)
      3-argument constructor setting the file name
      Parameters:
      greenActionsFile - the name and path of the file where green actions will be saved and retrieved
      tradeOffersFile - the name and path of the file where trade offers will be saved and retrieved
      residentsFile - the name and path of the file where residents will be saved and retrieved

      Returns:
      a ResidentList object with all stored students
